scripts.ruby: yarn docker:start && yarn test; yarn docker:stop
scripts.test: yarn generate && yarn parallel:local && yarn report:merge && yarn report:sandbox
scripts.test:prod: [ "TRAVIS_EVENT_TYPE" = "cron" ] && yarn generate:noskip || yarn generate && yarn parallel:local && yarn report:merge && yarn report
scripts.run: cd coverage_tests && APPLITOOLS_BATCH_NAME='Ruby Coverage Tests' APPLITOOLS_BATCH_ID=$(uuidgen) bundle exec rspec spec/coverage/generic
scripts.run:debug: cd coverage_tests && APPLITOOLS_BATCH_NAME='Ruby Coverage Tests' APPLITOOLS_BATCH_ID=$(uuidgen) APPLITOOLS_SHOW_LOGS='true' bundle exec rspec spec/coverage/generic
scripts.parallel:local: cd coverage_tests && APPLITOOLS_BATCH_NAME='Ruby Coverage Tests' APPLITOOLS_BATCH_ID=$(uuidgen) bundle exec parallel_rspec -n 4 spec/coverage/generic --isolate-n 2 -s 'Native'
scripts.parallel:local:eyes_selenium: cd eyes_selenium && APPLITOOLS_BATCH_NAME='Ruby Coverage Tests' APPLITOOLS_BATCH_ID=$(uuidgen) bundle exec parallel_rspec -n 4 spec/coverage/generic --isolate-n 2 -s 'Native'
scripts.parallel:local:eyes_appium: cd eyes_appium && APPLITOOLS_BATCH_NAME='Ruby Coverage Tests' APPLITOOLS_BATCH_ID=$(uuidgen) bundle exec parallel_rspec -n 4 spec/coverage/generic --isolate-n 2 -s 'Native'
scripts.parallel:local:eyes_images: cd eyes_images && APPLITOOLS_BATCH_NAME='Ruby Coverage Tests' APPLITOOLS_BATCH_ID=$(uuidgen) bundle exec parallel_rspec -n 4 spec/coverage/generic --isolate-n 2 -s 'Native'
